Description: Shoulder and neck section of a pale-red pottery wine-jar (ostracon) with convex upper-body and short cylindrical neck, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393544) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393544)
